access_your_resume_any_time: Save your progress for later, and access your resume any time.
add_a_title_that_summarizes: Add a title like 'Senior Financial Analyst' that summarizes your overall experience, or the type of role you are applying to.
adding_location_tooltip: Adding location details can help you be discovered by recruiters doing radius based searches.
allow_employers_to_contact_you: Allow employers to contact you by entering your phone number and email address.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_ent: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_res: Are you sure you want to delete this resume?

coffee.connect_with_me: When I'm not improving (or breaking) this website, you can find me playing video games, playing board games, or writing code at <1>Clover</1>. Connect with me <3>on LinkedIn</3>, and let's keep in touch.
coffee.donate_with_paypal_title: PayPal - The safer, easier way to pay online!
coffee.hi_im_mark: Hi, I'm Mark. Thanks for visiting EasyResume; I hope you found it useful.
coffee.other_ways_to_support: There are many other ways to support EasyResume. You can tell your friends and family about this website, or share us on social media. If you would like to become a corporate sponsor, support product development, help develop the EasyResume brand, or leverage your other awesome abilities, send me an email at <1>mark@easy-resu.me</1>.
coffee.payment_is_optional: Payment is optional â€” yes, you can use EasyResume 100% for free. There's no premium version, there's no catch. This tool should be available to everyone whether or not they can afford it. Sometimes, those who need this service the most are the least able to pay for it.
coffee.paypal_or_venmo: If you would like to buy me a coffee, you can use the PayPal donation link below, or Venmo me <1>{{venmoLink}}</1>. Not only will you earn my eternal gratitude, I'll also write you a Thank You note! If you change your mind within 30 days, <3>send me an email</3>, and you can get a refund.

covid_response.offering_for_free: To assist you during the COVID-19 outbreak, we are offering EasyResume completely FREE.

create_a_new_password_at_least_num_chara: Create a new password that is at least {{num}} characters.
education_supporting_info: If relevant, include your recent educational achievements.
generic_request_new_pw_reset: Something went wrong. Request a new password reset link <1>here</1>.

home_page.build_your_professional_resume_in_10: Build your professional resume in 10 minutes
home_page.instantly_download_completed_resume: Create a perfectly formatted resume in minutes, and instantly download it in PDF format.
home_page.made_with_muscle: Made with ðŸ’ª in the Bay Area
home_page.make_your_resume_stand_out: Make your resume stand out, get hired faster, and open more doors for you and your career.

links_supporting_info: Add your LinkedIn profile, portfolio, personal website, etc.
name: Name
prefill_your_resume_with_social_profile: Prefill your resume with info from your social profile
professional_experience_supporting_info: Include your last 10 years of relevant experience. List your most recent position first.
reset_password_token_invalid: Reset password token is either expired or invalid. Request a new password reset link <1>here</1>.
use_best_email_for_resume: Choose the best email for your resume. You will still use {{email}} to login to your account.
we_sent_a_password_reset_email_to: We sent a password reset email to {{email}}
we_will_send_reset_link: We'll send you a password reset link
